results.idea: EPS-estimate momentum (short-term)
results.description: Use est_eps momentum (short lookback) as alpha. I applied SUGGESTION1 by using the main EPS estimate field (est_eps). SUGGESTION2 not applicable (field scalar). SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage high). SUGGESTION4 applied: est_eps has good user/alpha counts. Kept implementation small per KEEP_IN_MINDs (<=2 datafields, <=7 operators). Confidence set at 0.75 because EPS momentum is a common, stable signal.

results.idea: Reported vs consensus EPS surprise
results.description: Measure surprise = reported EPS - consensus estimate to capture earnings beats. I used two fields (anl4_epsr_value, est_eps) per SUGGESTION1. Coverage for both is high so no ts_backfill needed (SUGGESTION3 not applied). Prioritize fields with high user/alpha counts per SUGGESTION4. Implementation obeys KEEP_IN_MIND constraints. Confidence 0.82 given direct link to price moves.

results.idea: EBITDA acceleration
results.description: Detect firms with accelerating EBITDA (momentum of announced EBITDA). Used anl4_ebitda_value (high user/alpha). SUGGESTION1 used one strong field; SUGGESTION3 not required; SUGGESTION4 satisfied. Implementation kept short. Confidence 0.70 because operational profits often lead performance.

results.idea: Net profit revision trend
results.description: Trend in mean net profit estimates signals earnings trajectory. Used est_netprofit and anl4_netprofit_mean (both high coverage). I combined two fields per SUGGESTION1 and favored those with decent user/alpha counts (SUGGESTION4). No ts_backfill needed. Implementation small and aligned with KEEP_IN_MIND. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Free-cash-flow per share surprise
results.description: FCFPS surprise: announced FCFPS vs median estimate. Used anl4_fcfps_mean and free_cash_flow_per_share_reported_value. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage for reported FCFPS is low -> applied ts_backfill where necessary (SUGGESTION3) but kept minimal. SUGGESTION4: used common estimate field. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Cashflow operations beat signal
results.description: Announced cash flow from operations vs mean estimate. Fields: anl4_cfo_value, anl4_cfo_mean. SUGGESTION1 used both fields; coverage moderate so ts_backfill optional (SUGGESTION3 applied if NA). Kept implementation compact. Confidence 0.70.

results.idea: Estimate dispersion (analyst disagreement)
results.description: High stddev of EPS estimates predicts revisions/volatility. Used earnings_per_share_standard_deviation (std) and earnings_per_share_estimate_count to weight conviction. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; for low coverage of std use ts_backfill (SUGGESTION3). SUGGESTION4: estimate_count has good counts. Implementation small. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Broker consensus momentum (recommendations)
results.description: Momentum in consensus recommendation score (anl4_mark). Combined with total recommendations to avoid thin coverage. SUGGESTION1 used anl4_mark and anl4_total_rec; anl4_mark coverage slightly <0.63 so consider ts_backfill (SUGGESTION3). SUGGESTION4: anl4_mark has many users/alphas. Implementation compact. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Upward revision ratio
results.description: Fraction of upward vs downward analyst revisions (anl4_ady_pu / anl4_ady_median or similar). I use anl4_ady_pu and anl4_ady_median to capture revision skew. Both have high user/alpha counts (SUGGESTION4). No ts_backfill needed. Kept operators minimal per KEEP_IN_MIND. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Guidance range shrinkage (quality of guidance)
results.description: Smaller guidance max-min implies clearer management outlook. Use max_reported_eps_guidance and earnings_per_share_minimum (or guidance bounds). Both fields have full coverage (SUGGESTION3 not applied). SUGGESTION1 used two fields; SUGGESTION4 satisfied. Implementation short. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: EBIT vs EBIT estimate divergence
results.description: Difference between reported EBIT and mean estimate flags surprises. Used anl4_ebit_value and anl4_ebit_mean (both high counts). SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4 applied. No ts_backfill required. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.74.

results.idea: Rapid EPS estimate revisions (rate)
results.description: High recent change in EPS mean signals new information. Use ts_delta(anl4_qf_az_eps_mean, 14) and ts_zscore. SUGGESTION1 used the EPS mean field; SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage high). Implementation minimal. Confidence 0.71.

results.idea: Large analyst count with low dispersion (consensus quality)
results.description: High estimate count and low stddev imply strong conviction: divide(est_eps_count?, earnings_per_share_standard_deviation). I used earnings_per_share_estimate_count and earnings_per_share_standard_deviation. For lower coverage of stddev apply ts_backfill (SUGGESTION3). SUGGESTION4: estimate count has good counts. Implementation short. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Cashflow trend vs EBITDA (quality)
results.description: Compare ts_delta(anl4_cfo_value) vs ts_delta(anl4_ebitda_value) to detect cash-quality divergence. Used two robust fields (SUGGESTION1+4). Kept operators <=7. Coverage acceptable so no ts_backfill. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Net debt reduction momentum
results.description: Firms rapidly reducing net debt are favorable. Used net_debt_amount and ts_delta on net_debt_amount. net_debt_amount coverage moderate; apply ts_backfill if needed (SUGGESTION3). SUGGESTION4 considered available counts. Implementation compact. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Book value per share upgrades
results.description: Rising analyst estimates of BVPS indicate improving fundamentals. Use anl4_bvps_mean and ts_delta. Coverage decent and user/alpha counts moderate so SUGGESTION4 partially applied. Implementation small. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Sales estimate acceleration
results.description: ts_delta of sales_estimate_average vs sales_estimate_stddev to find accelerating sales with low dispersion. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; sales_estimate_stddev coverage high so no backfill. SUGGESTION4 satisfied. Kept simple. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: High analyst upward revisions but low recommendation score
results.description: Conflict between many upward forecast revisions (anl4_ady_pu) and neutral/poor recommendation (anl4_mark) can signal mispriced names. Used two fields (SUGGESTION1) and high-count anl4_ady_pu (SUGGESTION4). Implemented compactly. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Free cash flow growth vs estimates
results.description: Compare announced free cash flow (anl4_fcf_value) vs est_fcf to identify surprises. est_fcf has moderate coverage -> ts_backfill applied if missing (SUGGESTION3). SUGGESTION4: used est_fcf. Implementation minimal. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Conservative guidance lagging revisions
results.description: Large positive delta between analyst mean estimates and management guidance suggests upcoming guidance updates. Used anl4_afv4_eps_mean and earnings_per_share_guidance_value. Guidance fields sometimes sparse -> ts_backfill applied (SUGGESTION3). Kept operators small. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Capex cut signal
results.description: Decline in capex estimates (anl4_capex_mean) flagged by negative ts_delta indicates potential free-cash-flow improvement. SUGGESTION1 used capex mean; coverage moderate so ts_backfill optional. SUGGESTION4 partially applied. Implementation compact. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: High recommendation total but falling EPS estimates
results.description: Mismatch: many recommendations (anl4_total_rec) while EPS mean drops (anl4_afv4_eps_mean). Two fields used (SUGGESTION1); both have adequate counts (SUGGESTION4). No ts_backfill needed. Implementation short. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: High-estimate-count stocks with rising EPS (conviction)
results.description: Combine earnings_per_share_estimate_count with momentum in est_eps to prefer consensus-driven rises. SUGGESTION1 applied using two fields; both have good counts (SUGGESTION4). No backfill required. Implementation kept small. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Reported pretax income surprise
results.description: Reported pretax income vs est_ptp captures core-profit surprises. Used anl4_ptp_value and est_ptp (SUGGESTION1). Coverage decent; ts_backfill not necessary. Implementation small. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Earnings quality: EBITDA vs reported EPS divergence
results.description: Contrast anl4_ebitda_value and anl4_epsr_value dynamics to detect accounting-driven EPS moves. Two strong fields used (SUGGESTION1+4). No backfill required. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Analyst estimate reversion (mean-revert EPS shocks)
results.description: Extreme short-term jumps in est_eps often revert; use ts_zscore over short window then reverse sign. Single field approach respects SUGGESTION1. Coverage fine. Implementation uses reverse to short overbought names. Confidence 0.50.

results.idea: High broker disagreement (count vs std)
results.description: Identify names with many brokers but high std of estimates: multiply an estimate count by stddev. Used earnings_per_share_estimate_count and earnings_per_share_standard_deviation. For low std coverage apply ts_backfill. SUGGESTION4 used estimate count. Implementation compact. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Dividend estimate upgrade
results.description: Rising dividend_estimate_median_value signals upgraded payout expectations. Use ts_delta(dividend_estimate_median_value). Coverage moderate; ts_backfill optional. Implementation minimal per KEEP_IN_MIND. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Dividend conviction (count-weighted)
results.description: Combine dividend estimate count with median to prefer well-supported dividend changes. Use anl4_afv4_div_number (count) and anl4_qfd1_az_div_median (median). SUGGESTION3: median coverage moderate so ts_backfill as needed. Implementation small. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: High guidance volatility predicts caution
results.description: High spread between guidance max and min signals management uncertainty. Use maximum_guidance_value and minimum_guidance_value. SUGGESTION1 used two guidance fields; both have moderate coverage so ts_backfill if sparse. Implementation kept compact. Confidence 0.47.

results.idea: Sales surprise vs prior quarter estimates
results.description: Reported sales minus sales_estimate_average to capture beats. Use actual_sales_value_annual and sales_estimate_average. Both fields high coverage so no backfill. SUGGESTION4 satisfied. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: EBITDA margin improvement signal
results.description: Compare anl4_ebitda_value to sales to get margin trend; use anl4_ebitda_value and actual_sales_value_annual. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; both have strong counts. Kept operators limited. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Rapid increase in number of upper estimations
results.description: Rising anl4_adxqfv110_pu (upper estimation counts) indicates bullish analyst view. Single-field signal used (SUGGESTION1). Coverage high; SUGGESTION4 satisfied. Implementation compact. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Large upward revisions but falling recommendation
results.description: Detect divergence: anl4_adxqfv110_pu upward revisions vs anl4_mark falling (two fields). SUGGESTION1 applied; anl4_adxqfv110_pu has good counts (SUGGESTION4). Implementation kept short. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: High estimate count with stable EPS (low volatility)
results.description: Favor names with many estimates and low ts_std_dev of est_eps: divide count by ts_std_dev. Used earnings_per_share_estimate_count and ts_std_dev(est_eps). If ts_std_dev sparse, use ts_backfill (SUGGESTION3). Implementation short. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Pretax income surprise per asset base
results.description: Normalize pretax surprise by total assets to compare across size. Use anl4_ptp_value and total_assets_amount. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; both have reasonable coverage. Implementation concise and within operator limits. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Guidance tightening (max-min shrink)
results.description: Shrinking guidance range over time indicates clearer management. Use ts_delta on max_reported_pretax_income_guidance and min_reported... (two fields). Many guidance fields full coverage so SUGGESTION3 not needed. Implementation short. Confidence 0.50.

results.idea: High announced EBITDA with low estimate dispersion
results.description: Combine anl4_ebitda_value and anl4_ebitda_number or anl4_ebitda_mean with dispersion to favor clear beats. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; applied ts_backfill to dispersion if coverage low. SUGGESTION4: ebitda fields have good counts. Implementation short. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: High analyst-adjusted net income momentum
results.description: Momentum in anl4_adjusted_netincome_ft signals revised core profitability. Field has very high user/alpha counts (SUGGESTION4). Single-field approach (SUGGESTION1). Implementation small. Confidence 0.78.

results.idea: Earnings per share z-score cross-section
results.description: Cross-sectional zscore of current est_eps to pick top decile names. Single-field, high usage (SUGGESTION4). No ts_backfill needed. Implementation minimal. Confidence 0.72.

results.idea: High growth but low count (risky breakout)
results.description: Large ts_delta in est_eps but low earnings_per_share_estimate_count indicates small analyst coverage breakout. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; prefer names with rising momentum but low coverage for alpha. Use ts_backfill if count sparse (SUGGESTION3). Implementation kept compact. Confidence 0.49.

results.idea: Persistent positive revisions (long-term)
results.description: Long-window ts_sum of positive ts_delta(est_eps) indicates sustained revision. Single field used per SUGGESTION1. Coverage good. Implementation within operator limit. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Cashflow per share upward revisions
results.description: Track anl4_afv4_cfps_mean momentum; combine with cfps estimate count if available. SUGGESTION1 used both fields; coverage moderate so ts_backfill applied to count if needed. Implementation small. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Large reduction in capex guidance
results.description: Falling capex guidance vs est_capex suggests margin improvement. Used est_capex and min_capital_expenditure_guidance. Guidance fields often full coverage so SUGGESTION3 not applied. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: High broker consensus with rising EPS
results.description: Combine broker upper counts (anl4_basicconafv110_pu) with est_eps momentum to favor analyst-consensus driven rises. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; both have good counts (SUGGESTION4). Implementation simple. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Rising reported EBITDA vs expected (operational beat)
results.description: Zscore of difference between anl4_ebitda_value and anl4_ebitda_mean to capture beats. Both fields have strong counts (SUGGESTION4). No backfill needed. Implementation minimal. Confidence 0.70.

results.idea: Large increase in number of forecasts (attention)
results.description: anl4_adxqfv110_numest rising implies greater analyst attention and potential re-rating. Single-field momentum used. Field has many users/alphas (SUGGESTION4). Implementation short. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: High payout conviction: announced dividend vs estimate
results.description: Compare actual_dividend_value_quarterly to dividend_estimate_median_value to detect dividend surprises. Two fields used (SUGGESTION1); coverage moderate so ts_backfill if needed. Implementation compact. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Earnings momentum in large-cap names (size-normalized)
results.description: Normalize est_eps momentum by total_assets_amount to focus on large-cap quality growth. Used est_eps and total_assets_amount (SUGGESTION1). Applied ts_backfill on assets if missing (SUGGESTION3). Implementation concise. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Analyst 'surprise' adjusted for dispersion
results.description: Reported EPS beat scaled by earnings_per_share_standard_deviation to prefer decisive beats. Used anl4_epsr_value and earnings_per_share_standard_deviation (SUGGESTION1). Applied ts_backfill to std if sparse (SUGGESTION3). Implementation short. Confidence 0.73.

results.idea: Rising shareholder equity vs net debt improvement
results.description: Combine shareholders_equity_total_2 momentum and falling net_debt_amount to detect balance-sheet strengthening. Two fields used (SUGGESTION1). Net debt coverage moderate so ts_backfill optional. Implementation within limits. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Growing analyst consensus (median rising)
results.description: Rising anl4_medianepsbfam (median EPS) signals consensus upgrades. Single field used; coverage moderate. SUGGESTION4 checked usage. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: High forecast count with negative trend (contrarian)
results.description: Many forecasts but falling mean (earnings_per_share_estimate_count high and est_eps falling); use multiply to identify crowded shorts that may mean revert. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; applied inverse on est_eps delta. Implementation short. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Strong gross income momentum
results.description: Use anl4_gric_value momentum vs anl4_gric_mean to capture beats in gross income. Two fields used (SUGGESTION1); both have good alpha counts. Implementation small. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: High analyst-rated score with improving fundamentals
results.description: Combine anl4_basicdetailrec_ratingvalue with anl4_ebitda_value momentum: favor names with both. Two high-count fields used (SUGGESTION1+4). Implementation concise. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Stable EPS estimates with rising cashflows (quality)
results.description: Low ts_std_dev(est_eps) combined with positive ts_delta(anl4_cfo_value) to favor quality growth. Two fields used; apply ts_backfill to std if needed. Implementation small. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: High announced operating profit vs expectations
results.description: Use operating_profit_before_depr_amort and anl4_ebit_mean difference to detect operating surprises. Both fields have solid coverage; SUGGESTION4 used high-count ebit fields. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Sharp rise in analyst numest with rising median
results.description: Combine anl4_adxqfv110_numest increase with anl4_ady_median rising to capture growing conviction. Two fields used (SUGGESTION1), both have good counts (SUGGESTION4). Implementation short. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Low estimate dispersion but rising EPS (safer longs)
results.description: Low earnings_per_share_standard_deviation combined with positive ts_delta(est_eps) to find stable consensus growth. SUGGESTION3: backfill std if sparse. Implementation small. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Rising announced cashflow per share vs estimate
results.description: Compare anl4_af_cfps_value (actual CFPS) with anl4_afv4_cfps_mean (estimate) to capture CF beats. Two fields used; CFPS fields have moderate counts. Use ts_backfill for missing est (SUGGESTION3). Implementation concise. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Increasing goodwill concerns (watch)
results.description: Rising total_goodwill_amount vs anl4_totgw_mean may signal acquisition-related risk. Used two fields; coverage moderate so ts_backfill optional. This is a defensive alpha (short bias). Confidence 0.43.

results.idea: Large upward revision concentrated in few brokers
results.description: High ts_delta in broker-specific estimates (use anl4_eaz1laf_estvalue) vs market est to detect boutique broker-driven moves. Two fields used; broker fields sometimes sparse so ts_backfill applied per SUGGESTION3. Kept implementation minimal. Confidence 0.45.

results.idea: Rising reported EPS relative to asset base
results.description: Normalize reported EPS (anl4_epsr_value) by total_assets_amount to compare across firms. Two fields used; both have decent coverage. Implementation compact. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Sudden surge in recommendations (total rec spike)
results.description: Detect spikes in anl4_total_rec via ts_delta to find new analyst focus. Single-field momentum applied; field has many users (SUGGESTION4). Implementation short. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Earnings upgrades concentrated in large brokers
results.description: Compare broker upper counts (anl4_basicconafv110_pu) to total_rec to see concentration. Two fields used; both have good counts (SUGGESTION4). Implementation concise. Confidence 0.51.

results.idea: High reported EBITDA with increasing estimate count
results.description: Combine anl4_ebitda_value beat vs anl4_ebitda_number rising to prefer growing conviction beats. Two fields used (SUGGESTION1); both have strong counts. Implementation minimal. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Persistent negative revisions (long-term short)
results.description: Long-window ts_sum of negative ts_delta(est_eps) to detect sustained downgrades. Single-field used per SUGGESTION1 and coverage is good. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Rapid change in forecast stddev (rising uncertainty)
results.description: ts_delta of earnings_per_share_standard_deviation identifies rising analyst disagreement. Single-field approach; if coverage low use ts_backfill (SUGGESTION3). Implementation small. Confidence 0.50.

results.idea: Sales beat quality: reported vs median estimate scaled by dispersion
results.description: (actual_sales_value_annual - sales_estimate_median_value) / sales_estimate_standard_deviation prioritizes decisive beats. Used three fields? To respect KEEP_IN_MIND2, use two: actual_sales_value_annual and sales_estimate_standard_deviation and backfill median implicitly by using mean (sales_estimate_average). SUGGESTION1 applied; coverage high. Confidence 0.71.

results.idea: Rising reported cashflow vs expected across quarters
results.description: Compare anl4_cff_value (CF from financing) momentum to est_cashflow_fin to detect financing-driven realignments. Two fields used; coverage moderate so ts_backfill applied if missing. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: High analyst rating with increasing free cash flow per share
results.description: Multiply analyst rating (anl4_basicdetailrec_ratingvalue) with ts_delta(anl4_fcf_value) to find rated firms improving cashflow. Two fields used; both have counts. Implementation short. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Earnings acceleration vs capital expenditure trend
results.description: Firms with rising est_eps and falling est_capex may improve margins; use est_eps and est_capex. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; est_capex coverage moderate so ts_backfill if needed. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: High-quality earnings: EPS rise with falling stock option expense guidance
results.description: Combine est_eps momentum with min_stock_option_expense_guidance falling. Two fields used; guidance full coverage so SUGGESTION3 not required. Implementation brief. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Large announced FCF with low forecast dispersion
results.description: anl4_fcf_value beat scaled by anl4_fcfps_number (confidence) to prefer supported FCF improves. Two fields used; fcfps count large (SUGGESTION4). Implementation short. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Rising sales with shrinking estimate dispersion
results.description: Positive ts_delta(actual_sales_value_annual) combined with lower sales_estimate_standard_deviation signals confident growth. Two fields used; std dev coverage ok (SUGGESTION3 optional). Implementation minimal. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Rapid broker-concentrated upgrades
results.description: Rising anl4_basicconafv110_pu but low anl4_basicconafv110_numest indicates a few brokers driving upgrades; potential alpha. Two broker fields used; apply ts_backfill for sparse ones (SUGGESTION3). Implementation concise. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Large decrease in SG&A guidance alongside rising EBITDA
results.description: Combine falling selling_general_admin_expense_reported_value and rising anl4_ebitda_value to capture margin expansion. Two fields used; SG&A coverage modest so ts_backfill if necessary (SUGGESTION3). Implementation short. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Large reported pretax income normalized by shares (per-share improvement)
results.description: Normalize anl4_ptp_value by basic shares (use basic_shares_max_guidance_qtr as proxy) to find per-share profit improvement. Two fields used; guidance proxy coverage high. Implementation compact. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Upgrading free cash flow per share momentum
results.description: Rising anl4_fcfps_mean momentum signals improving shareholder returns. Single field used (SUGGESTION1). Coverage moderate; ts_backfill applied when sparse. Implementation short. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Earnings surprise scaled by number of upper estimations
results.description: Reported EPS surprise times anl4_ady_pu to emphasize widely-upgraded beats. Two fields used; both have strong counts (SUGGESTION4). Implementation kept compact. Confidence 0.75.

results.idea: Rapid increase in analyst median for adjusted net income
results.description: ts_delta on anl4_netprofita_mean (adjusted net income mean) flags upward revisions in adjusted profits. Single-field approach; anl4_netprofita_mean has good counts. Implementation compact. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: Large announced operating profit vs guidance
results.description: Compare operating_profit_before_depr_amort to operating_profit_before_depr_amort_max_guidance_qtr to catch management understatements. Two fields used; guidance has strong coverage. Implementation minimal. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Earnings per share improvement with rising recommendation score
results.description: Combine ts_delta(est_eps) with anl4_basicdetailrec_ratingvalue to favor fundamentals meeting analyst sentiment. Two fields used; both have strong counts. Implementation short. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: High reported EBITDA with falling capex (cashflow improvement)
results.description: Use anl4_ebitda_value and ts_delta(est_capex) to detect operational cashflow upside. Two fields used; est_capex coverage moderate so ts_backfill suggested. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Large positive skew in EPS estimates (more upper estimates)
results.description: Use anl4_ady_pu (upper estimates) vs anl4_ady_median to capture skew; prefer names with many uppers. Two fields used and both have good counts (SUGGESTION4). Implementation kept minimal. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Rising report frequency (many announced financials) with positive surprise
results.description: Combine anl4_basicqfv4_actual (announced) momentum with reported surprise anl4_epsr_value - est_eps. Two fields used; coverage high for announced. Implementation compact. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: High consensus but recent downgrades (contrarian)
results.description: High anl4_basicconafv110_mean with recent negative ts_delta(est_eps) suggests crowded longs being downgraded. Two fields used; both have decent counts. Implementation minimal. Confidence 0.44.

results.idea: Strong reported sales with low previous guidance (upside surprise)
results.description: Compare actual_sales_value_annual vs sales_min_guidance_value to detect beats relative to guidance floor. Two fields used; guidance fields often full coverage. Implementation short. Confidence 0.70.

results.idea: Rising analyst median for EBITDA with low std
results.description: anl4_ebitda_mean momentum combined with low anl4_ebitda_number dispersion (or ts_std_dev) to find stable upgrades. Two fields used; apply ts_backfill for dispersion if sparse. Implementation compact. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: High consensus EPS but few actuals (fragile)
results.description: High anl4_basicconqfv110_median with low anl4_basicqfv4_actual might indicate fragile expectations. Two fields used; both have reasonable counts. Implementation short and conservative. Confidence 0.41.

results.idea: Rising cash flow operations per share vs estimate
results.description: Compare cash_flow_from_operations (actual) with est_cashflow_op (estimate mean). Two fields used; coverage moderate so ts_backfill applied if needed. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Rapid increase in number of lower estimations (sell signal)
results.description: Rising anl4_adxqfv110_down counts indicates growing pessimism; single-field momentum used per SUGGESTION1. Field has many users/alphas. Implementation minimal. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Improving EPS with declining estimate dispersion
results.description: Positive ts_delta(est_eps) combined with falling earnings_per_share_standard_deviation to highlight confident improvements. Two fields used; backfill std if sparse. Implementation small. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Rising net profit median vs mean (upside concentration)
results.description: anl4_netprofit_median rising faster than anl4_netprofit_mean can indicate improving skew; used two fields (SUGGESTION1). Coverage good. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: High announced operating cashflow per asset
results.description: Normalize anl4_cfo_value by total_assets_amount to find efficiency gains. Two fields used; both coverage ok. Implementation short. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Large overdue guidance upgrades (big jump in guidance)
results.description: ts_delta(max_reported_pretax_income_guidance) picks sudden management upgrades. Single guidance field often full coverage; SUGGESTION3 not required. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: High EPS surprise scaled by total recommendations
results.description: Reported EPS beat scaled by anl4_total_rec to emphasize broadly-noted beats. Two fields used (SUGGESTION1) and counts are large (SUGGESTION4). Implementation minimal. Confidence 0.72.

results.idea: Rising reported net income vs analyst adjusted net profit
results.description: Compare net_profit_reported_value and anl4_netprofita_mean to identify realized outperformers. Two fields used; both coverage high. Implementation short. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: High-quality upgrades: EBITDA up with rising shareholders' equity
results.description: Combine anl4_ebitda_value momentum with shareholders_equity_total_2 momentum to favor durable improvements. Two fields used; both have good counts. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Rising mean EPS with falling net debt (balance sheet repair)
results.description: Combine anl4_afv4_eps_mean momentum with reverse(ts_delta(net_debt_amount)) to favor EPS growth with deleveraging. Two fields used; apply ts_backfill to net_debt if sparse. Implementation short. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Consensus upgrade velocity (numest * median delta)
results.description: Multiply anl4_adxqfv110_numest with ts_delta(anl4_ady_median) to find rapid consensus moves with many forecasters. Two fields used; both have strong counts. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Rising estimated book value per share with falling net debt
results.description: Combine anl4_bvps_mean momentum and reverse(ts_zscore(ts_delta(net_debt_amount))) to favor improving fundamentals. Two fields used; net_debt may need ts_backfill. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: High analyst coverage with improving EBITDA per share
results.description: Use anl4_ebitda_number to weight anl4_ebitda_value momentum. Two fields used; both have good counts (SUGGESTION4). Implementation small. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Rising est_eps with falling forecast std (consensus strengthening)
results.description: Combine ts_zscore(ts_delta(est_eps)) and falling earnings_per_share_standard_deviation; if std coverage low, use ts_backfill. Two fields used as per SUGGESTION1. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Large broker-driven EPS upgrades (broker est vs market est)
results.description: Difference between a broker estimate field (anl4_eaz2lqfv110_estvalue) and market est (est_eps) flags influential broker activity; broker fields sparse -> ts_backfill per SUGGESTION3. Implementation minimal. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Sustained dividend upgrade momentum
results.description: Long-window ts_sum of positive dividend_estimate_median_value changes to find sustained payout upgrades. Single field used and coverage moderate; ts_backfill applied if needed. Implementation short. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Large increase in forecasted cash flow per share with high conviction
results.description: Combine ts_delta(anl4_afv4_cfps_mean) with anl4_afv4_cfps_number to emphasize well-supported CFPS upgrades. Two fields used; counts moderate. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Rising analyst-adjusted net income with falling forecast std
results.description: Combine anl4_netprofita_mean momentum with inverse of anl4_netprofita_std to favor confident upgrades. Two fields used; both are available with decent counts. Implementation compact. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: High recent guidance increases
results.description: ts_delta on guidance_reporting_currency or guidance values (guidance_estimate_value) to capture management upgrades. Single field approach; coverage moderate so ts_backfill as needed. Implementation short. Confidence 0.50.

results.idea: Earnings acceleration concentrated in a few sectors (cross-sectional zscore)
results.description: Use zscore of est_eps cross-sectionally to pick top names but scale by industry-neutral group later (GROUP ops excluded here per KEEP_IN_MIND). Single-field cross-sectional quantile used to remain simple. SUGGESTION4: est_eps strong counts. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Sustained reduction in net debt per asset
results.description: ts_delta(net_debt_amount) normalized by total_assets_amount detects durable deleveraging. Two fields used; net_debt may need backfill (SUGGESTION3). Implementation small. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Rising research & development spend with rising sales (investment-driven growth)
results.description: Combine ts_delta(research_development_expense) and ts_delta(actual_sales_value_annual) to find firms investing for growth. Two fields used; R&D coverage low so ts_backfill is recommended (SUGGESTION3). Implementation short. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Growing estimate count with rising EPS median (broadening coverage)
results.description: Multiply anl4_dez1qfv4_est (est value proxy count) with anl4_median_epsreported momentum to catch broadening analyst interest. Two fields used; both have solid counts. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Large improvement in reported EBITDA per share
results.description: Normalize anl4_ebitda_value by shares proxy (basic_shares_max_guidance_qtr) to find per-share operational improvement. Two fields used; both have reasonable coverage. Implementation small. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Rising announced cashflow with falling estimate dispersion
results.description: Combine anl4_cfo_value momentum with falling anl4_cfo_number dispersion (or std) to prefer confident cashflow beats. Two fields used; cfo fields have good counts. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: High analyst rating improvement with estimate revisions
results.description: Combine anl4_basicdetailrec_ratingvalue delta with ts_delta(est_eps) to favor sentiment corroborated by fundamentals. Two fields used; rating field has many users (SUGGESTION4). Implementation short. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Rising adjusted net income relative to assets
results.description: Normalize anl4_netprofita_value by total_assets_amount to find ROA-style improvements from announced adjusted net income. Two fields used; coverage decent. Implementation compact. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Short-term EPS mean reversion after extreme spike
results.description: Detect extreme ts_zscore(ts_delta(est_eps,3)) spikes and reverse (short) expecting mean reversion. Single-field approach; coverage high. Implementation uses reverse. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Rising number of upper estimations normalized by total rec
results.description: Divide anl4_ady_pu by anl4_total_rec to find names where most recommendations are uppers (consensus strength). Two fields used and both have good counts. Implementation simple. Confidence 0.59.
